name: @r2o3/rgchart
description: A library for parsing and writing rhythm game charts.
author: menvae

scripts.build: wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir dist-node && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir dist-web
scripts.build-release: wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs --out-dir dist-node && wasm-pack build --release --target web --out-dir dist-web && npm run fix-pkg
scripts.pack-node: cd dist-node && npm pack && shx mv rgchart-*.tgz ../rgchart-node.tgz
scripts.pack-web: cd dist-web && npm pack && shx mv rgchart-*.tgz ../rgchart-web.tgz
scripts.pack: npm run build-release && npm run pack-node && npm run pack-web
scripts.publish: npm run build-release && npm run publish-node && npm run publish-web
